titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry star Pee Wee King at Belmont High School

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black on yellow) Hatch poster announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Pee Wee King, Marion Worth, Redd Stewart, Collin Sisters, and others at the Belmont High School on April 7. Poster features metal photoplates of Pee Wee King, Marion Worth, Redd Stewart, and the Collin Sisters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
